question: How to raise a complaint for Wrong Product Delivered in Forward and RTO delivery?
answer: To raise a complaint for wrong product delivery (both Forward and RTO), you need to provide valid visual proof within the specified time frame.
steps: Ensure you record an unboxing and prepackaging video.
Make sure the tracking number is clearly visible in the video.
The video must be shared within 48 hours of the delivery date.
Send the video to your respective KAM (Key Account Manager) for further processing.
note: Complaints submitted after 48 hours or without a proper video with visible tracking details may not be considered for resolution.
